result.eng: Is this the road between Belfast and Derry?
result.ga: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.orig: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.html: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus DoireIs this the road between Belfast and Derry?
result.ponchtml: An é seo an bóṫar idir Béal Feirste agus DoireIs this the road between Belfast and Derry?

result.eng: This is the road to the south.
result.ga: Seo an an bóthar ó dheas
result.orig: Seo an an bóthar ó dheas
result.html: Seo an an bóthar ó dheasThis is the road to the south.
result.ponchtml: Seo an an bóṫar ó ḋeasThis is the road to the south.

result.eng: The road connects Belfast and Derry.
result.ga: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.orig: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.html: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus DoireThe road connects Belfast and Derry.
result.ponchtml: Ceanglaíonn an bóṫar Béal Feirste agus DoireThe road connects Belfast and Derry.

result.html: Lean an bóthar sinFollow that road.
result.ponchtml: Lean an bóṫar sinFollow that road.

result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.orig: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.html: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: Téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar Ṡráid na gCeannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: I live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ga: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.orig: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.html: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bótharI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ponchtml: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóṫarI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.

result.eng: The road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ga: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.orig: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.html: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ponchtml: Dúnaḋ an bóṫar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
